external_references.source_name: Hiding Malicious Code with Module Stomping
external_references.description: Aliz Hammond. (2019, August 15). Hiding Malicious Code with "Module Stomping": Part 1. Retrieved July 14, 2022.

description: Monitor for process memory inconsistencies compared to DLL files on disk by checking memory ranges against a known copy of the legitimate module.(Citation: Hiding Malicious Code with Module Stomping)
